content.text:
# 2017 President's Cup (tennis) – Women's singles__disambig_1

Zhang Shuai
| runner   =  Ysaline Bonaventure
| score    = 6–3, 6–4
}}
Alyona Sotnikova was the defending champion, but chose not to participate.
Zhang Shuai won the title, defeating Ysaline Bonaventure in the final, 6–3, 6–4.
Seeds
Zhang Shuai (champion)
#  Naomi Broady (semifinals)
#  Veronika Kudermetova (semifinals)
#  Polina Monova (second round)
#  Marie Bouzková (semifinals)
#  Tara Moore (first round)
#  Alla Kudryavtseva (first round)
#  Varvara Flink (second round)
}}
